Title: That's My Sweatshirt
Writer: Robia Rashid (created by), Dennis Saldua, Dennis Saldua (executive story editor), Ava Tramer (story editor), Michael Oppenhuizen (staff writer), Jen Regan (staff writer)
Actors: Jennifer Jason Leigh, Keir Gilchrist, Brigette Lundy-Paine, Amy Okuda
Plot: Sam becomes rattled after Paige invades his bedroom. Casey visits Clayton Prep and gets a taste of what life away from her brother would be like.
